dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HJ 99 PCS: Relating to the disapproval of the President’s exercise of authority to suspend the debt limit, as submitted under section 1002(b) of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 on October 17, 2013.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar, pursuant to Sec. 1002 of Public Law 113–46

form.official-title: Relating to the disapproval of the President’s exercise of authority to suspend the debt limit, as submitted under section 1002(b) of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014 on October 17, 2013.

section.text: That Congress disapproves of the President’s exercise of authority to suspend the debt limit, as exercised pursuant to the certification under section 1002(b) of the Continuing Appropriations Act, 2014.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives October 30, 2013.

endorsement.action-desc: Received; read twice and placed on the calendar, pursuant to Sec. 1002 of Public Law 113–46
